table_description: Azure Key Vault Managed Hardware Security Module

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the managed HSM Pool.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The Azure Resource Manager resource ID for the managed HSM Pool.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the managed HSM Pool.

columns.name: hsm_uri
columns.description: The URI of the managed hsm pool for performing operations on keys.

columns.name: enable_soft_delete
columns.description: Property to specify whether the 'soft delete' functionality is enabled for this managed HSM pool. If it's not set to any value(true or false) when creating new managed HSM pool, it will be set to true by default. Once set to true, it cannot be reverted to false.

columns.name: soft_delete_retention_in_days
columns.description: Indicates softDelete data retention days. It accepts >=7 and <=90.

columns.name: enable_purge_protection
columns.description: Property specifying whether protection against purge is enabled for this managed HSM pool. Setting this property to true activates protection against purge for this managed HSM pool and its content - only the Managed HSM service may initiate a hard, irrecoverable deletion. The setting is effective only if soft delete is also enabled. Enabling this functionality is irreversible.

columns.name: create_mode
columns.description: The create mode to indicate whether the resource is being created or is being recovered from a deleted resource. Possible values include: 'CreateModeRecover', 'CreateModeDefault'.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: SKU name to specify whether the key vault is a standard vault or a premium vault.

columns.name: tenant_id
columns.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant ID that should be used for authenticating requests to the key vault.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the managed HSM.
